body:
Navigate to the component you want to edit. To do this, either:

- navigate to the page using 'Build mode', then click on the pencil (✎) or brackets ('{}') icons on the left
- navigate to the page using 'Properties mode', then click on the component’s name

Like when [editing pages](/edit-pages), you’ll see a list of properties you can edit.

Additional properties for components are:

- **Label**: sets the html <label> tag
- **Hint**: sets any hint text you want to display to the user
- **Items**: lets you add individual items to the component
heading: Editing components
